DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine incidence recurrent caries around different type restorative material ( composite , amalgam , ceramic , crown , etc . ) good characterize recurrent caries lesion term location size lesion type , material age restoration .
DOC.brief_title: Incidence Recurrent Caries Next Tooth Restorations
DOC.detailed_description: The data collect patient visit dental clinic check-up . These data retrieve patient record . In particular clinical ( mouth ) exam radiographic image ( 'RX-bite-wings ' ) , routinely take check-up consultation , use evaluation recurrent caries . Information regard medical background , oral hygiene , sugar eat habit possible parafunctional activity also gather patient file . In addition , caries risk patient assess use commercial kit analysis saliva ( Saliva-Check Buffer , GC , Tokyo , Japan ) dental plaque ( Tri Plaque ID Gel , GC , Tokyo , Japan ) , part routine care patient clinic .
DOC.criteria: Patients visit university dental clinic ( Department Oral Health Care ) dental checkup Patients necessary data could register ( incomplete mouth exam record , miss RXbite wing , etc )
